text: Meskipun saya stay di kota Padang, tapi apabila ada teman-teman dan saudara saya yang datang dari luar kota, dan butuh bantuan reservasi kamar hotel, maka saya akan rekomendasikan untuk menginap di Hotel Axana Padang. Ada banyak pertimbangan yang dapat dikemukakan, antara lain hotel ini berlokasi di pusat kota Padang dan dekat dengan beberapa objek wisata. Disamping itu yang paling penting sekali adalah soal harga yg relatif murah, kebersihan, dan pelayanan prima. Begitu kita masuk lobby hotel, kita sudah disambut dengan keramah tamahan petugas hotel, khususnya di bagian reception. Meskipun dalam suasana banyak tamu yang antri untuk proses check in, namun tidaklah mengurangi kegesitan petugas reception dalam memberikan pelayanan. Terakhir saya ke Axana bersama seorang teman yg datang dari Medan, kami dilayani dg baik dan tepat waktu oleh petugas reception bernama Vega. Di samping itu, kondisi kebersihan dan kenyamanan kamarnya pun sangat baik dan tidak mengecewakan.  Kamar dengan tipe standar sekalipun ukurannya cukup luas  bila dibandingkan dengan hotel berbintang 4 lainnya di kota ini. Yang tidak kalah pentingnya untuk dicatat adalah soal tarif (rate) kamar yang sangat murah untuk ukuran hotel berbintang 4. Hampir tidak ada hotel bintang 4 di kota ini yg ratenya seperti hotel Axana. Oleh karena itu, Hotel Axana adalah sebuah pilihan yang tepat dan “recommended” untuk menginap di kota Padang.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Hotel ini unggul di lokasi, berada di kota. Praktis juga jika butuh makan di luar, karena berdekatan dg KFC dan Exelso. Menu makan paginya boleh. Saya suka sapi lada hitamnya yang enak dan bubur kacang hijau ketan hitamnya sedap. Namun, pilihan menunya terlalu sedikit. Sosis ayam atau sapi, yang sy pakai sbg standar hotel berbintang, tidak dijumpai.

Dari sisi fasilitas bisa dikatakan cukup bagus. Namun demikian, rasanya hotel ini perlu memperhatikan beberapa hal sbg safety concern:
- tangga di sebelah lift tanpa dinding atau railing. Riskan jatuh terutama buat anak kecil
- sbg tangga darurat yg harusnya tertutup shg kedap api, tangga itu harusny berdinding bata
- tangga itu tidak bisa dipakai dr lt 6 (kolam renang) ke bawah karena ditutup secara permanen
- ada beberapa perbedaan level lantai yg rawan menyebabkan jatuh. Harus ada pemberitahuan kpd pengunjung, spt dlm bentuk tanda kuning di lantai

Kolam renang di lantai 6 termauk keren krn berview ke gunung dan gedung sebelah yg beratap gadang. Sayang, tidak ada tempat duduk berpayung di area kolam, shg praktis gerimis sesedikit apapun aktivitas berenang terhenti krn barang2 kebasahan. Area duduk berpayung berada cukup jauh, shg kurang aman terhadap barang bawaan tanpa pengawasan.

title: Hotel megah dan bersih

text:

title: kepuasan

text:
kelebihan: 
1. kondisi hotel diduga masih baru
2. Lobby hotel cukup baik
3. penerima tamu dan petugas check in cukup baik dan ramah serta cepat
4. harga menarik

yang perlu diperbaiki:
1. Peraturan harap ditegakkan. dimana mana saya melihat orang merokok dengan bebas di area hotel. area publik seperti jalan menuju kamar, di lift, di lobby, di restoran... bau asap rokok. ini mengerikan. bagaimana dengan hak para orang yang tidak merokok? padahal sudah ada tanda dilarang merokok dimana mana. bagaimana dengen risiko kebakaran karena api rokok? kan hotelnya berkarpet....???

2. Lift ada dua tapi yang berfungsi cuma 1. merepotkan sekali. harus lama mengantri untuk naik turun dst.

3. petugas kebersihan kamar tidak membersihkan kamar dengan baik. selama tinggal 2 malam dikamar, petugas pembersih kamar tidak melakukan tugas dengan baik. kamar mandi masih kotor, kamar masih kotor, perlu di latih ulang.

4. jalan dari lift menuju kamar terlalu gelap. mungkin karena pemilihan warna karpet dan wallpaper yang terlalu gelap. kesannya jadi mengerikan
title: hotel yang kurang disiplin

text:
Saya menginap di Axana pada tanggal 17-18 Desember yang lalu,
Kesan pertama cukup mengesankan...saya datang sebelum jam 12 (11.15 kurang lebih) untuk check-in (karena urusan kantor diundur hingga jam 3)...tapi disuruh menunggu karena kamar untuk saya belum siap (masih ada yang belum check out)...saya sangat mengerti hal ini, dan umumnya memang demikian...:-)
Jam 12.10 menit resepsionis memanggil saya dan meminta maaf karena membuat saya menunggu, karena hal tsb resepsionis meng-upgrade kamar saya menjadi Junior Suite (kamar 328...woww!! (dalam hati saya)...hingga saya baru tersadar menjelang malam, ketika saya ingin buat teh/kopi..ternyata ketel air tidak tersedia!!..saya coba hubungi resepsionis..sepertinya terkejut juga resepsionisnya..dan berkata akan coba dicek dan disiapkan...tak lama kemudian saya dihubungi resepsionis lewat telepon..dan dikatakan bahwa tidak ada lagi ketel air yang bisa digunakan karena terpakai semua di ruangan hotel....Oo..Oo....okelah jika demikian (walaupun sebenarnya saya tidak pernah melewatkan kopi/teh yang ada di hotel, karena saya biasa bekerja hingga larut...)..itu kekecewaan pertama.
Yang kedua adalah saat esok paginya saat akan mandi, saya coba menggunakan bath tub-nya, saya nyalakan air hangatnya...lalu menggunakannya dengan semestinya sampai....saya sadar ternyata lubang pembuangan air di bath tub tsb tidak berfungsi....haduuuhhh.....
saya hubungi pihak hotel dan segera dikirimkan maintenance-nya dan org tsb pun kesulitan untuk memperbaikinya hingga perlu bantuan kawannya....
Akhirnya saya putuskan utk check out pagi itu (rencananya agak siang tadinya) karena sudah terlanjur merasa kurang nyaman....
title: Rancak sabananyo...tapi...

text:
Hal bagus dari hotel ini yang menurut saya bagus adalah kolam renang yang berada di atas gedung dengan pemandangan kota dan pantai. Selain itu ada 2 kolam renang, dimana salah satunya adalah kolam renang air hangat. Selain itu, koneksi internet pun sangat bagus sehingga memudahkan untuk pengguna hotel yang melakukan perjalanan dinas. 

Sedangkan hal yang membutuhkan perbaikan adalah:
- Kondisi kamar relatif tidak bersih dan perabotan di kamar agak kusam terlihat dari debu yang masih menempel di meja. Sebaiknya dari pihak hotel melakukan supervisi terhadap staf yang membersihkan kamar untuk menjaga kualitas layanan. 

- Bila sarapan di pagi hari jam 6.30, banyak makanan yang belum siap disajikan.  Namun kalau sarapan pada jam 8.00, makanan relatif sudah disajikan. Sepertinya hotel ini tidak sesuai untuk pengguna perjalanan dinas, yang seringkali harus keluar dari hotel di pagi hari. 

- Pelayanan di bagian resepsionis pun kurang bagus. Nama saya dikatakan tidak terdaftar padahal sudah dipesan melalui kantor, dan anehnya diantara 4 orang yang pergi hanya nama saya yang tidak ada. Kemudian, staf administrasi di kantor di telpon oleh pihak hotel pada saat saya sudah check out. Dikatakan bahwa saya telah memesan 2 tambahan kamar tapi belum membayar. Padahal saya tidak pernah memesan dan  saat saya check out tidak ada pemberitahuan tentang hal ini. Sebaiknya sistem informasi check in dan chek out perlu mendapatkan perbaikan
title: hotel ini membutuhkan banyak perbaikan

text:
Dimana sebaiknya saya mulai.

1) Kami memesan 4 kamar untuk kami semua yang berjumlah 8 orang. Sewaktu kami tiba pertama kali pukul 4.30 sore, kami diberitahu bahwa kamarnya belum siap karena handuk kamar mandinya belum tersedia.

2) Kami meminta kamar di lantai atas dan kami diberikan kamar yang berada di lantai 5 yang mana terlihat belum beroperasional secara penuh. 2 dari kamarnya tidak mempunyai lemari pendingin. 2 dari kamarnya mempunyai seprei yang kotor. Kamarku mempunyai handuk bernoda yang sudah terlihat tua.

3) 1 dari kamarnya yang paling buruk. Kamarnya panas dan kami tidak bisa mengatur alat pengatur suhunya. Sewaktu kami menginformasikan stafnya, mereka menyarankan pemecahan masalah itu dengan kipas angin. Kami sudah melakukan itu namun kipas anginnya tidak menghembuskan udara dingin karena temperatur udara dalam kamarnya tinggi, 28/29 derajat. Pintu kamarnya juga terlihat belum selesai dengan bagian yang hilang.

4) Pada umumnya koridor dan lorongnya lembab dengan tidak ada penyejuk udara atau ventilasi.

5) Sarapannya tidak lezat dan mereka kehabisan telur pada saat sarapan sementara berjalan.

6) Tukang pijit yang telah diatur oleh hotelnya kacau. Mereka salah waktu dan datang terlambat ke kamar kami. Meskipun kami meminta untuk dipijit selama 1 jam, beberapa hanya mendapatkan 40 menit saja namun tetap di bebankan biaya penuh.

7) Wifinya tidak bekerja dengan baik selama beberapa kali dalam waktu 2 malam kami berada di sana.

8) Tidak ada keset untuk kamar mandi yang diberikan meskipun kami telah memintanya.

Kelebihannya :

1) Mayoritas dari stafnya ramah dan membantu, khususnya pelayanan kamar dan zetna dan beberapa staf di meja depan

2) Lokasinya cocok. Dekat dengan pantai untuk melihat matahari terbenam yang indah dan makan malam dengan sajian menu laut.

3) TV kabelnya bagus.
title: Mengecewakan

text:
Saya menghabiskan akhir minggu di hotel Axana dan saya benar-benar menikmatinya. Fasilitasnya cukup baik, khususnya kolam renang yang berada di lantai paling atas dan lobi. Sarapan dengan ala prasmana di pagi hari tidak begitu lezat namun mereka mempunyai tempat telur dadar yang mana bisa menggantikan semua makanan yang lain ! Meskipun demikian apa yang saya nikmati sebenarnya adalah stafnya yang sangat profesional, selalu tersenyum, mencoba membantumu dan yang pada dasarnya membuatmu merasa semuanya mungkin. Mereka akan bernegosiasi untuk harga yang terbaik bagi anda di tempat penerima tamu !
Jika kamu kecewa dengan perjalananmu ke Padang (pantai yang indah tidak selalu mudah ditemukan) kamu pasti tidak kecewa dengan hotel Axana!
title: Pengalaman yang menakjubkan

text: Stayed here with my Indonesian wife on the second leg of our honeymoon after getting married in Bali. Spent one night in an awful hotel around the corner and checked into here for only rp100k more a night. Aircon great all be it a little noisy. Staff so friendly polite and helpful. Room was cleaned immaculately every day. They would even put our shoes tidily in pairs. Bed very comfortable. Roof top bar and pool great. Although it does shut a bit early  20:00pm but there is a bar downstairs in the main lobby usually with a singer. Breakfast is lovely. Good Indonesian food and the usual western toast eggs cereals etc- but who wants to eat that in indonesia eh? Might as well stay home.  Corridor decor is a bit gloomy and quite tatty in places. All in all a great 4 night stay - I would definitely recommend and stay here again. A few tweaks here and there and this hotel could be 5 star. Keep up the good work folks.
title: A l

text:
We were in transit to Mentawais islands so only stayed 1 night each end of our trip, but great value for money.  Check in was simple and quick, everyone was helpful.

The rooms, standard twin share room was big enough and comfortable for 2 guys with surf board bags, air-cond was good and quiet, internet was decent, bathroom was clean and good.

The hotel, pool at roof top was great at sunset after a long days travelling, bar service was good, there was a spa with massage.  Breakfast was included and really good buffet.  The hotel had dinner too, but we ate out at local establishments to get a taste of Padang.

All in all, great hotel for the price.  Stay there.
title: Great Hotel for Padang

title: Nice Lobby

text:
This hotel was OK, a bit luxury hotel, with clean and spacious room, and bathroom with towels, with option for 3 people with extra bed in one room, a double bed and extra bed, and flat screen TV. Complimentary drinks, tea and coffee available at each room. The receptionist was helpful, at certain days a live music performed at the restaurant at the Ground Floor. The room rate was include the breakfast, fried rice. However, one that really disappoint us was the Smoke Cigarette smell. The first room gave us is at 218, it was really has bad smell. Some one, a heavy smoker definitely abused the hotel rule of non smoking in the room, so we asked to move to the other room. Then the hotel gave us a room at 5th level and this room was much better than the first room, in term of NO cigarette smell. 
Not a bad experience for one night stay though.
title: Nice Hotel not too far from city centre

text:
I thought it was a 3-star hotel, but the lobby looked more like 3.5-4 star.  We had two twin beds in our room which was comfortable for 2 people.  The bathroom though, was missing its door but it was not a big thing so we did not complain.  

While we were on the 5th level, there was a roof just 2 levels down from our window.  The bad thing was that the window was broken and in fact, we were disturbed by some unwanted visitors who rang our door bell but didn't apologize if they got the wrong room.  So we called the night manager who was a very nice and helpful man.  It was close to midnight when we called down and he got a worker to come fix the window lock immediately.  Such service was exemplary.

By the look of the room itself, it showed that this was an old hotel (even as the Hotel's Lobby looked gleaming and posh).  The linen had stains on it so I flipped it over, and there was another stain!  

I don't even remember the breakfast which means it wasn't anything special.  But this hotel had packed jams.

The hotel was very close to the sea and market-place but we were leaving already so did not have much time to explore the surroundings.
title: My expectations were not high

text:
When I called from Singapore to make the booking, I mentioned that the hotel doesn't have good reviews as regards it's wifi connection but told that the problem has since been rectified.
In reality, the wifi connection was so bad that I had no choice but to change hotels the next day.
Having said that, there were some 
plus factors : front office staff spoke good English, we're helpful, room was ok, location was good, and prices not too bad.
title: let down by the wifi

text: Hotel looked impressive from the outside! Friendly reception staff, foyer was all decked up in festive mood (tall Christmas tree, glittering lights and décor, strung-up greetings and Christmas songs playing overhead). Our room and bathroom were okay, but couldn’t work the air-cond control, hair-dryer was defective and the closet door came off during sliding! As it rained the night we arrived, we ate in at the restaurant downstairs. Food quality’s not up to standard, though: the portions were small, really small; the soup’s lukewarm and the satay’s hard as rubber jerkies! But the service staff was commendable, ever attentive and obliging. We thoroughly enjoyed the live music at the lobby café and danced the night away, as it was Christmas Eve! Breakfast was buffet spread, lots of varieties, enjoyed that! Hotel’s in the middle of the town, within walking distance to most places: KFC next door, churches, local restaurants, markets, beach, shops, offices, police station, bus-stops…. we stayed only 2 nights in Padang.....
title: Still room for improvement...

text:
the location of this hotel very strategic, easy to access by public transport, close to central of padang night life, traditional or modern market, historic place, closed to Chinese area or Chinese restaurant around.

the most important thing is KFC right beside the door.

text:

Some of our group had flooding issues and showers falling apart whilst others stayed at the inner ring where you can enjoy the nightclub in your room. Others again were on the outer ring but too close to the air conditioner outlets which made a lot of noise.

But if you carefully select your room and test if all is working properly you will have a good stay. Smoking in non smoking rooms happens a lot too :(

Breakfast was good. Staff had to be reminded a couple of times of what we were waiting for (in general). 

Swimming pool was good and clean enough plus great location of the hotel near to the Chinese area, beach and malls.

Kami sangat senang atas kenyamanan yang kami berikan. Standar kami dalam pelayanan sangat diperhatikan.

Terima kasih

Best Regards

Yusra ANIM
General Manager

text:
My staying has been absolutely amazing , room is really comfy, food is tasty , staff crew is outstanding, couldn’t actually be in a better hotel. Surely I’m coming back . 
I’ve personally met GRO Alfano who is very, efficient, kind, respectful and helpful as he is a really great English speaker. He has reached and exceed all my expectations.
title: A week in Axana

owner_response.text:

text: It is the right choice to stay in this lovely hotel, beside the services and the facilities there is a very strategic location, cause its place in the centre of Padang City. It nears the beach actually.

owner_response.text:

text: We made reservation for 2 bedrooms. We wait for 3 hours for check in. And only got one of our room. And another room we got for next two more hours. We understand maybe due too a lots of people that check out. But there was no complimentary offered. And when we got the other room key for the other room. And the front desk named RANTI WILORI very impolite. I talked to her she answered me without even look at my face. I asked for another key. Because when my kids went to swimming, we have to go out since no key. Need key for take the elevator. She didn’t want to help. Considering this hotel already disappointed for very late checking time. And I don’t know, is there any standard operating procedures in this hotel. How long you can neglected your guests and what you should do for make them feel better? I hope someone in this hotel can speak English so can reply this complaint!!
title: The second time staying but getting worse

text:
nice stuffs ,specially very warm welcoming reciption guy Alfano.

now price is very good, about 360-400k Rp per night that is very good for 4 star hotel , need little repair for rooms but it's all fine ,
title: Axana

owner_response.text:
Dear roselafkhos.

It was a great time to be with at The Axana Hotel Padang last few days ago,thank your time for sharing your  experience.
 
Please advise your Agenda to are visit Padang and we do look forward to welcoming you back  soon 

Best Regards.

Yusra ANIM
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I should say it was nice stay for me ,thanks frindly staffs and to reciption alfano he helped me alot for my travel , 

Considering the price and service it was nice stay , 

A/C, bed, amenities and shower was good
title: Nice hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Alextuhi.

Alextuhi, thank you for sharing your experience during your stay with us The Axana Hotel Padang. we are more than happy to serve you better in the next visit,see you again in Padang.

Best Regards,

Yusra ANIM

text: I travel to Padang a few times a year and always stay at The Axana Hotel. Good food,  good accommodation and the staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. I was especially impressed with Alfano Ganteng, he was very polite and went out of his way to ensure my stay at the hotel was pleasant.
title: AWESOME AND CONVENIENT

owner_response.text:

Best Regards

text: Friendly and helpfully staff, especially alfano. Food was good,but please make Standart cooking,I ordered 2 times for the same food, different taste. nice swimming pool and comfortable rooms.will back again soon
title: Awesome!!!!

Thank you

text: Recomended hotel for family trip, Nia at front desk was very friendly staff and very helpfull...they had a nice swimming pool on the rooftops, our children was very happy for swim there and overall our stay was happy 👍
title: Nice hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Caiyolo.

Thank you very much for the review, we are happy to know that you had a pleasant stay with us. 

We look forward to welcoming you back.

Thank you.

Best Regards.

Yusra ANIM
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: On my way to the Mentawai Islands for surfing, me and family stayed at this hotel. Comfortable and clean room with all I needed. Friendly staff. A coffee for 3 eur in Indonesia is a little too much. I went to a restaurant next street for lunch.
title: Good place for a one night stay

text: The Axana hotel is not cheap (1.200.000 IDR/night) and not very good. The a/c is noisy, the rinsing tube next to the toilet was leaking, and the water didn't go into the drain, so there were puddles everywhere. Pool is OK, sunsets are great.
title: Nothing but a building with a semi-infinity pool

text:
Pro: Check In process very quick and smooth, Reception area/Lobby area very spacious. Buffet Breakfast very great with many of choices and price very affordable for add on. Staff very helpful. Pool area is big and we had time use it although it is over the closing time. the staff did not rush us to stop swimming. We had a great dinner by the pool area afterward. The food order taking little bit time to serve but bearable to wait.

Con: The snack in the room not included. Could be better if you could make it complimentary in the room. 

Overall great to stay and will reconsider to come here again as we did not have much time to explore the hotel due to we stayed for 1 night only.

We travel on August,2018.
title: Worth  to stay!!

text:
Large hotel with friendly service oriented staff. Breakfast had very  good local components. A/C was a bit noisy, but it was a great stay.
Pool on the roof was nice and fitness room was well equipped. 
I will definitely come back.
title: very friendly and good breakfast

text:
The hotel was kinda packed during my visit, I had to wait to get my room ready. But no worries their luxurious lobby is all for you to relax while sipping your welcome drink (surprisingly good).
Staffs were super helpful.
The room was so so for me.
The hotel has a night club at the basement area so it was (or still is) noisy during midnight, also, it placed in the middle of busy street. To those who fancy quietness, better request a room on the higher floor.
Didn't get to try the food they served other than breakfast. KFC is just a few walks away though, just in case.
The best of all is their infinity pool at the rooftop! Not that spacious but the view is really breathtaking.
Overall it was a pleasant experience.
title: Hotel in the middle of busy streets.

text:
If you want to stay in the city of Padang, this hotel is very suitable for your needs.

Many of street foods and cafe around this hotel.

You my simply walk surround the hotel to go and see the city view.

I don’t think the food is best in this hotel, just average in the matters on taste.
title: Small hotel near the city

text:
We stayed here with my group who just finished climbing Gunung Kerinci. We booked 5 rooms and my guests were extremely satisfied with the quality.

Deluxe Rooms were clean, toilets were nice with hot showers (What we needed!!!).

The bed was very comfortable and TV had cable connection with international movies.

The spa and massage was one of our highlights. Very clean, professional and friendly. Defintely a must do for the after-trek tourist!

Outdoor Swimming pool was not too bad, with a small Jacuzzi by the side.

Breakfast was taken away as we had an early flight and we had a choice of local or American.

I have stayed there twice now and I will continue to bring my clients here next year!
title: Spacious, professional spa, infinity pool and family oriented breakfast!

text:
Terrible service and facilities! Extremely noisy room with loud music on outside, since evening until midnight. Only offered a change of room after asking for the third time. Was confronted and questioned by a senior staff at the reception with a very rude attitude why a room change was needed. Stained bed sheet, stained bathroom floor, dirty shower head and bath mat. Broken hairdryer and asked for another one for four times but still not one was offered. Electricity stop early in the morning on our last day of stay!

Poorly maintained hotel with terribly bad customer service!
title: Worst hotel I have ever stayed at!

text:
So after reading the hotel details, I booked myself into a deluxe room with a balcony. As a smoker I much prefer to smoke outside than in the room. However upon arrival, I was told that none of the deluxe room balconies were accessible. And that there was only 1 room (superior) that had an accessible balcony albeit with a lousy view. Note the balcony was unlocked throughout my whole stay as there was no latch.

While I didn't really inspect the deluxe room, the superior does fall short. The shower heads obviously need cleaning due to the visible fungus/gunk.

The breakfast was good with a fairly extensive spread as well as room service and laundry.
title: Average rooms but good service

text: I wonder when the first time I read some review about axana on online booking,  when I was there for 2 night was great experience,  extremely friendly staff, nice room and delicious food. will be back soon.
title: Great service and amazing swimming pool view

text: I was staying here for business trip from 7 until 9 May 2018. The staffs are good and very helpful. The hotel is situated in the city center area and walking distance to some shops and local attractions. The rooms are clean. The swimming pool provides a great view of the town.
title: Nice Bedroom & Easy to access

text: I think its suit as 3 star hotel than 4 star, the room so tiny and the air conditioner does not work properly, so hot on the daylight. When we stayed at the hotel, the restaurant for the breakfast is occupied by high school students, so many student passing by, the parking lot so small, many motorcyles parked there. the pool is on the rooftop but they rent to public, so public can swim there for pay.the only positive feedback from me is the breakfast, delicious and variatif.
title: So so hotel

text: The most i like about this hotel is the service, when we want to parking our car they help so much, and when we want to take it again they also help us. and they clean up our room everyday even we just stay for 3 nights. but honestly i dont like the room especially the bath room, first they told us on articel if they have a hair dryer for each room but we didnt get it, second the towel kinda like a garbage, its so dirty and we can not use the towel, third the bathroom door can not be closed, fourth the warm water not working well, we need to wait until 10 minute to get the warm bath, fifth the furniture kind like old furniture, sixth the air conditioner not working well. breakfast not too bad
title: Bad bedroom but good service

text:
I decided to pick this hotel as the hotel location looked good and the price is reasonable.
The room is clean overall and basic amenities are there, but I could see some dirty spots on the furniture.
The shower head looked almost broken, al though water flow was ok. The joint was loose and it was bit rusty.
The hotel staff was polite and the service  was ok, but the hotel needs some maintenance. 
For the price I paid, it was ok, but if the room charge is higher, I will not choose this hotel.
title: Average hotel, not really 4 star

text:
I was asked to pay arround IDR400k by the receptionist when I check-out coz there was a blood stain found on my cover sheet she said. I complained and asked her to show the hotel policy that said so but she showed me nothing.

When I asked her to show the cover sheet it looks like she has prepared one under his table, wow so fast. I don't even see the house-keeping coming. Not long after, the housekeeping came with his drunk eyes and lousy face telling me that he found a blood stain on my bed. After 5mins argue they finally return my deposit. 

I turn found out that medret18 also experiences the same and wrote review on this TA.
title: They try to extort you

owner_response.text:
Dear Our Valued Guest,
Warmest Greetings from The Axana Hotel Padang

Thank you for staying with us and taking your time to write your comment on TripAdvisor.

An honor for Management and the entire team of The Axana Hotel Padang Hotel to serve you during your stay in our hotel. 
Regarding your comment about the cover sheet, it actually already exist in the hotel policy, and we are very sorry if the Front office didnt show it. we have follow up these matter and hopefully our facilities and services will meet your expectation for the next time.

We would be pleased to welcome and assist you again as our guest in the near future.

Kindest Regards,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stay for a night on my business trip.
It was horrible.
1. Room is not ready
2. Soaked wet bathroom floor
3. Sinks is full of water 
4. Many lighting is not working
5 staff is far from professional 
6. Carpet less room
This hotel will definitely on my no go area list.
title: Never again

text:
The aircon in the room was noisy enough to hinder a decent sleep, along with the lights blaring through curtains. The smell of cigarette smoke was super strong in the room - I guess old smoke had really settled into the curtains. 

Nice rooftop pool. Clean bedding & towels. Food was pretty good at the restaurant. Location is good. Nice staff.

We had a superior room, I think. An extra bed had been squeezed in to accommodate our son at a charge of US$25. Cramped. 

Our one night stay was a brief stopover for us on our way to the Mentawai islands, organised for us by the management of this gorgeous resort we are currently at on a little island near Siberut. When we stay one more night in Padang next week at Axana, I hope we can get the family suite, and that it has been a non-smoking room with a a quiet aircon unit.
title: It was OK

text:
The hotel is well located on the centre of Padang. There is a beautiful swimming pool on the rooftop. 
The room are ok
But the service is horrible :- 2 hours to get an incomplete order at night 
- 1 hour to get two beers and they kept the change !

To avoid !
title: Worst service ever !

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Guillaume M

Warmest greetings from The Axana Hotel Padang!

Thank you very much for your comments in regards to your stay at The Axana Padang. Specially for a beautiful swimming pool on the rooftop. And It is always a pleasure to receive feedback from our valued costumers.

I will share your comments with our team and I am sure that your feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services and improve our guest facility.

Thank you again for sharing your experience and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in your future visit to Padang.

Sincerely,

Monang Marbun, SE
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: No towels in room on arrival and noise from night club was out of control. I was on 3rd floor to and requested a quiet room. Service in restuarant was poor and they tried to overcharge me for my room from price I was given at booking.com not impressed at all and I don't usually write bad reviews so that's saying something. There are plenty of better options.
title: Not impressed

text: Hotel looks wonderful until you look a little closer. It appears that it hasn't been finished off properly and in some areas not built properly for example the decking around the pool is warping because it hasn't been installed properly. The pool looks fabulous and has a wonderful view, but it could use a good clean because it was slimy on the bottom and around the edges? The room layout was fine, but in the bathroom our basin overflowed onto the floor because the tap leaked when you turned it on. An in room safe would have been good. Breakfast was also disappointing with a lot of the dishes cold but in a warmer. Everywhere you look there are wires exposed and unfinished details. On the plus side it really has great potential if there was a little attention to detail and was clean and tidy in general, .
title: Ok as a transit stop for now

text: Stayed there for an office event.  We book a twin share room plus an extra bed. My friend have to order extra bed few times before she gets what she wants. Food was average but the staff are friendly.  Close to shop that sells local food (spicy chips)
title: It was okay but can use some improvement

text: My friends and I stayed for a night on our way back from Bukit Tinggi. Room was neat and clean. Kinda chic too. Breakfast spread was impressive - with both local delicacies and western delight. You will be spoilt! No mistake, if I am ever in Padang, I'll be back again to this hotel!
title: A Chic Hotel

text: Maria Vivi Octavia restaurant staff given very good attention for buffet items and always refill fast and good attention to every guests. value for money to stay here. Swimming pool on the roof top area excellent view.
title: excellent service & nice building architecture

text: I wish I could recommend this hotel. It is a handsome building with a grand lobby and a lovely staff, but its negatives outweigh all of that. We checked in in the early evening, but the hotel at that time was so short-staffed that our bags had to wait outdoors for ten minutes until the sole bellman had the time to care for them. The room we were taken too was, especially in comparison to the lobby's elegance, disappointingly functional. Worse, the door to the balcony swung freely open, no key to be found. Two workmen came to check in response to my phone call for help. They told me to wait. I waited . . . until I made my way to reception and asked for another room. We were given a new room with a secure balcony. But once ready to sleep, we heard the booming bass of the nightclub housed in the hotel. Not just heard . . . we felt (I am not exaggerating) the whole room shake from the vibrations of the club's bands. (Given that this new hotel stands on the site where the Hotel Ambacang collapsed during Padang's 2009 earthquake, a vibrating room is the last thing the new hotel's management should want its patrons to experience.) The bands play until 3 am. I couldn't sleep soundly until then. We did sleep a bit late into the morning because of this, but we made it to the buffet breakfast an hour before it closed only to find all the dishes, and the food in them, cold. Never again.
title: A hotel for those who don't care to sleep.

text:
i stay here often when im in and out of padang and of the few ive stayed at i would rate this one the best! the rooms are spacious with cable tv, noce bathrooms with toothbrush etc.... 
this hotel was recently built so is in good condition. it has a massive lobby and breakfast buffet is massive with so much to choose from (eggs, rice, noodles, veggies fruit, other indo foods, breads, cake, cereal... and more)

i didnt even know it had a pool on the roof so thats another plus because padang can get very muggy. location good too- walk to toko saudara (just a shop stocking international things) for western type snacks or a few local restaurants close by... theres an ATM next to hotel too...
title: amazing for padang

text:
I only look for three things in a three star hotel.  One is a decent bed with a good mattress.  The second is a clean, functional bathroom.  The last is a decent breakfast buffet.

The Axana is a very nice hotel with courteous staff and cheery atmosphere, however, upon checking into my room, there were no towels or floor mats in the bathroom.  Worse yet, the shower door was completely missing so I had to wash myself in a corner in order to try to avoid getting the rest of the bathroom floor wet.  Fortunately, the staff immediately brought me some towels (they forgot to bring the bath mat) upon request, showing their commitment to service.

The breakfast here doesn't have the best selection but whatever they serve is tasty.  This is better than the others that give you a large selection but tastes bad.

When asking for the user name and password for WiFi access the staff had a hard time pronouncing 8 and I was unable to log on because I kept typing h instead.  That being said, this is Indonesia so, if you want to confirm access to WiFi (not just here but in any hotel), it's best to get it in writing from the front desk upon check-in.

I recommend this hotel for anyone that's looking for budget accommodations in a convenient location in Padang.
title: Almost The Best Value In Padang

text: We spent one night at the Axana on our way to a surf resort in the Mentawai Islands. The Axana is conveniently situated from the airport (traffic wasn't too bad) and a luxurious oasis in Padang. Our interleading rooms were large, clean and very comfortable. Room service was quick and the food was tasty. We will definitely stay here again when next through Padang.
title: Clean, comfortable and convenient

text:
1) My regret in this trip was that I did not bring Wi-Fi computer but brought LAN-type computer. Not only my room but also my collegue’s room, we could not use internet. There was a LAN hole in the rooms but it might not connect to internet.
2) I had to use business centre’s computer paying Rp. 20,000 per hour. Hungry mosquitoes were waiting. I was bitten more than 10 places by the mosquitoes in one hour.
title: Bring your Wi-Fi computer

text: Its location is quite central, but Padang's development seems to be away from this area, focused more along the coastal area. Hence, there are not many eateries and entertainment outlets nearby (only the old central market within walking distance). In terms of the hotel facilities, they are quite adequate. Good breakfast spread but the service starts only from 7.00 am, so you will definitely miss it if you depart for early morning flights.
title: Good hotel, mediocre service

text: Spent 1 night there in transit to Mentawai islands. Forget trying to sleep in rooms on the street side. My non-smoking room was full of stale smoke when I arrived and the the bathroom sink was blocked. The window curtain was half hanging and I had to hold it against the window with a chair. Doors where banging all night with arriving or departing guests. Slept 2 hours and happy to get away from the place.
title: Never again

text: Average hotel but clean. we stayed there for 2 nights. The rooms were ok. Only the shower  head was not functioning properly. Other than that our sleep was pleasant. Breakfast was ok. The hotel wifi cannot be connected most of the time. Frustrated sometimes when you have limited time to check important mails etc. The staffs are friendly. Just beside the hotel is KFC.
title: Average Hotel

text: We are happy with the hotel and room condition. We stayed here for 3 nights. Breakfast spread was not bad either. Variety TV channels. Room was well maintained. Air-con also worked well. The bathroom was alright too. The hotel is located nearby a fast food chain - Kentucky Fried Chicken. 10 mins walk to market which sells all sort of products. Staff were friendly and helpful too. However there was no wi-fi connection.
title: The Axana Hotel - Padang

photos.caption: More view of the hotel's room

text: We checked in at Axana on our 1st and last night and we loved the new modern feeling the hotel gives. Check in was also a breeze. Staff was experienced and expedited our check in knowing that we were all exhausted at 1am. The pillows were thick and fluffy and each room came with 2 additional pillows. We were in heaven and didn´t want to wake up. The amenities set was also cute! My kids were happy that there were a lot of English channels and even Disney. The only thing that bugged us was the fact that it took a long time to cool the room down. No matter what mode i changed the remote to, it always ended up the same 27 degrees which was ridiculous! The hotel corridor was colder than our rooms! Breakfast was also satisfactory. Not as fabulous as some other Indonesian hotels we´ve stayed in but we were happy except for the margerine they used! Older hotels used butter and a new one like Axana uses margerine? Come on! I´ve heard spooky stories about this hotel as this building was built over the collapsed hotel during the earthquake. Many people died that day on that spot so we were quite apprehensive. Thank goodness we had no experience with the third kind!
title: Lovely Hotel! Only the fixed AC temperature needs improving!

text:
Stayed for 1night. Decent sized lobby with a bar and a 2person band playing. Rooms were okay but the AC was squeaking all night which did bother me.Bathrooms are small and the view - not so great at all overlooking the road.

The bathroom floor towel was not clean and requested them to change it which they did. The replacement did not look any better.....
title: Average for a 4 star hotel

text: Nette, schone kamers en super lekker zwembad. Hier de was laten doen, ook prima/ zeer netjes en snel. De croissants bij het ontbijt waren echt lekker. Eigenlijk viel dit hotel in positieve zin erg mee. Er zit een echt goede koffie bar bij. Wat mij betreft 3,5 a 4 ster.
title: Prima

text: No es el mejor hotel que hemos estado en Padang, la recepción y desayuno están bien pero es una pena sobretodo por la habitación que estaba más sucia y antigua que el Inna Hotel. Pero está en el centro, y para pasar el día es correcto.
title: Suficiente para pasar el día

text: Het hotel is gelegen in het centrum van Padang en op loopafstand van het strand en de stopping Mall en de Chinese wijk met prima restaurantjes. De kamers zijn voldoende ruim en schoon. Er is een zwembad op de 6e verdieping met een prachtig uitzicht. Het eten is er prima en betaalbaar. Het ontbijt is zowel westers als Aziatisch. Het hotel leent zich zowel voor transit als voor enkele overnachtingen om de stad en omgeving te zien.
title: Prima hotel

text:
L'hotel est de qualité avec des chambres tout confort; un restaurant et un bar servant des expressos et vrais cafés, une piscine sur le toit et un service excellent.
L'hotel est très bien situé dans le centre de Padang non loin de la plage et de nombreux restaurants locaux.
A recommander.
title: Très bon hotel

text: Lekker hoor, na een paar dagen een wat minder hotel nu een luxe. Kamers waren nog niet klaar toen we kwamen maar het werd snel in orde gemaakt. Ruime kamer, heerlijke douche en een lekker bed. Wel veel last van de weg aan de voorkant. Zorg dus voor een kamer aan de achterkant!!
title: Even lekker luxe

text:
L'Axana hôtel est très bien situé et offre de très belles chambres spacieuses pour un tarif très convenable. 
La piscine à débordement sur le toit vaut le détour pour la vue sur la ville ainsi que le spa pour ses massages à prix très attractifs.
Le personnel est très affable et très courtois et aux petits soins.
Demander une chambre loin de la boîte de nuit.
Le restaurant est simple et un peu lent mais très correct.  Le petit déjeuner est copieux mais à l'Indonésienne.
Ne pas hésiter à aller faire un tour au marché qui se trouve à 5mn à pied. On y trouve de tout.
title: Excellent hotel

text: Hotel bien situé. Personnel agréable mais qui parle mal anglais. Chambre propre, calme. Piscine sur le toit au top. Tres bonne connexion internet. Petit dejeuner avec du choix mais pas tres bon. Massage de 1h fait au spa sans grand intérêt. En résumé hôtel froid sans charme. Dépanne mais rien d'exceptionnel.
title: Correct

text: als afsluiting van de tour Medan - Padang verbleven we een nacht in het hotel. Het inchecken ging niet zo vlug, maar het welkomstdrankjes maakte dat weer goed. Het personeel is vriendelijk en behulpzaam. De kamer was ruim allen een handdoek in de badkamer is niet veel.
title: Goed hotel

text:
Wij verbleven één nacht in dit hotel als afwisseling tijdens onze low-budget  backpackreis. De check-inn was redelijk traag, maar gelukkig kregen we een welkomstdrankje om de tijd te verdrijven. Het personeel was overigens erg vriendelijk en attent, ongeacht onze oude kloffies en backpacks. 
Het hotel ziet er mooi uit, maar mist een persoonlijke touch in het design. De kamer zelf zag er ook prima uit, maar mist hier en daar de puntjes op de i. Bijvoorbeeld: één handdoek per persoon en één paar badslipper voor twee personen is niet wat je verwacht in een vier-sterren hotel. Het zwembad op het dak is erg fijn en apart met een uitzicht over de stad. De glibberige bodem van het zwembad was minder prettig. De service bij de bar op het dak was tergend traag, een uur wachten op twee cocktails. Toch is het lastig hier boos om te worden als het personeel zo vriendelijk is. 

Het ontbijt was redelijk gevarieerd en alles werd regelmatig bijgevuld.

Helaas stond onze bij het hotel aangevraagde auto naar het vliegveld niet op het afgesproken moment klaar en moesten de dames van de receptie dit last-minute nog regelen. Gelukkig waren we ruim op tijd, maar vervelend is het wel. Door de taalbarrière (van de dames) konden wij de dames niet duidelijk maken dat het een probleem was dat het niet geregeld was. Door de vriendelijkheid van het personeel zijn bovenstaande punten toch vergeven.
title: Trage service, vriendelijk personeel

text: O Axana é um hotel bastante confortável. Lá, encontrei um café da manhã com frutas, ovos, pães, sucos e iogurtes, além dos pratos típicos da Indonésia, como Mie Goreng, Nasi Goreng, etc. A Internet é boa e o serviço de quarto ágil. Os quartos são confortáveis e o mobiliário está em ótimo estado. Ideal para quem precisa descansar antes ou depois de ir para as Mentawai. Uma boa dica é explorar alguns picos locais durante esse período de descanso, como a praia Air Manis, que rola boas ondas. O preço foi bem em conta, em comparação com outros hotéis da Indonésia, mas eu buquei com um agente, por isso recebi um bom desconto.
title: Ideal para quem vai ou vem das Mentawai

text:
Le boite de nuit de l'hôtel nous a inondé de basses jusqu'à 2h du matin, puis le Muezzin a entammé ses mélopées à 4h ! Autant dire que la nuit a été plus que courte.
Le personnel comprend difficilement l'anglais. Les restaurant est tout juste dans la moyenne, et pire que tout, malgré la réservation et le prè-paiement d'une voiture pour 6h pour gagner l'aéroport, nous avons dû attendre le véhicule près de 30 min, au risque de rater l'avion !!!... Bref, rien d'exceptionnel dans cet hôtel. Il y a surement beaucoup mieux à Padang.
title: Bruyant et incohérent

text:
L'axana est un bel hôtel près du centre de Padang.
Je dois regretter 2  ou 3 choses: juste une serviette de toilette pas de linge de main. Un personnel peu enclin à porter les bagages,mais pressé pour qu'on paie et fournisse le passeport.
Et le pire pour moi: l'odeur du tabac incrusté dans les rideau et dasn toute la chambre. Idem pour la seconde chambre.
title: dommage
